colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,SDOM GSUM LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG GIS NYIN ZHAG PHRUGS GCIG LA CHOS SPYOD BYA BA'I RIM PA, MDOR NA ZAS KYI RNAL 'BYOR, PHUD MCHOD CHANG BU, @007B YON SBYONG GI SNGAGS SOGS KYANG THUS SHING, GO BDE BA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS CES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, RIS MED PA'I DAM PA MANG POS MDZAD PA'I CHOS SPYOD RAB GSAL RNAMS DANG, KHYAD PAR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I RNAM MKHYEN DU BGROD PA'I BDE LAM GYI SNYING PO BSDUS, GZUNGS 'DI DAG DAM PA SO SOS BKOD PA GCIG MI GCIG SNA TSOGS 'DUG PA RNAMS, LO TZ'A BA THUGS RJE DPAL BA DANG, ZHA LU LO TZ'A BA SOGS KYIS DAG STER MDZAD PA'I DPE KHUNGS THUB RNAMS LA GTUGS TE DAG PAR BYAS NAS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SUG BRIS SU BYAS PA'O, ,)
